snippet.title: How to Say Goodbye - Official Gameplay Trailer | Summer Game Fest 2022
snippet.description:
How to Say Goodbye is a narrative puzzle game where you help a group of ghosts discover who they are and why they're lingering in the world after death. Solve puzzles by reorganizing each level like a Rubik's Cube, in a storybook world inspired by children's illustrations like the Moomins and Where the Wild Things Are.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
